title: No, Government is Not Distributing Solar Panels For Free
subtitle: Fact Check: A viral message on social media claims that the government has launched a scheme that would provide solar panels for free. However, this is fake news.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: A viral message on social media claims that the government is distributing free solar panels to everyone. Further, the message claims that one just has to fill a form and the last date to apply is 25 May. The claim reads:
